participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and introspective, Luna thrives on connecting with nature and advocating for animal rights.
participant_1.background: i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. the holidays make me depressed.

participant_2.name: Miguel
participant_2.personality: Creative and curious, Miguel enjoys exploring different cultures through language and music.
participant_2.background: i also study languages. i'm a musician. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish.
